Articles.Content:
My ksp patcher zip file says it is invalid. I have deleted and reinstalled several times to no avail.

Vallore125

[email protected]

The KSP patcher has not been functional for a very long time.

If you bought the game through the KSP website store, you'll need to re-download the latest version of the game in its entirety.

If you bought the game from Steam, the Steam patcher should work fine.
